pageContext.claim: “Baltimore is a -- it’s an example of what corrupt government leads to. Billions of dollars have been given, and I feel so sorry for the people of Baltimore. And if they ask me, we will get involved. But we're already involved from the standpoint that, over many years, billions and billions of dollars have been given to Baltimore...It’s been stolen with a lot of corrupt government. And as you know, Cummings has been in charge.”
pageContext.analysis: Records tracked by The Baltimore Sun show that over the past two years, city government got $380 million in federal aid — far less than $1 billion. Trump provides no evidence money has been "stolen."
